name: @react-querybuilder/material
description: Custom MUI (Material Design) components for react-querybuilder

scripts.build: vite build && tsc --emitDeclarationOnly && yarn copy-src-to-dist && yarn downgrade-dist-src
scripts.copy-src-to-dist: copyfiles -f src/index.ts src/MaterialActionElement.tsx src/MaterialDragHandle.tsx src/MaterialNotToggle.tsx src/MaterialValueEditor.tsx src/MaterialValueSelector.tsx src/utils.tsx dist/ts
scripts.downgrade-dist-src: replace "import type" "import" ./dist/ts -r --silent && replace ", type " ", " ./dist/ts -r --silent && replace "{ type " "{ " ./dist/ts -r --silent
